Name: Zoning, 78-08 Linden Boulevard Rezoning, Queens (C 240145 ZMQ).
Title: Application number C 240145 ZMQ (78-08 Linden Boulevard Rezoning) submitted by Linden Canyon LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 18b, eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C1-2 District, changing from an R4 District to an R6A District, changing from an R4 District to an R7D District, and establishing within the proposed R7D District a C2-4 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 10, Council District 32.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Zoning Subcommittee Meeting - January 26, 2026
